Looking to sell for BS or PP only.

a superior vultite handaxe 7x, superior forging Bubble Flares -- HDP 14k BS or $84

a shimmering black vultite buckler 7x, T1 Ensorcell Max light (3 lbs) small sized shield 9k BS or $54

an onyx-stemmed curved bog-wood pipe unlimited tobacco, self-filling, self-lighting pipe tons of ambient scripts 10k BS or $60

rub my pipe You gently rub your pipe, and a pale blue glow surrounds the bowl. When the glow fades away your pipe is full of dark, aromatic tobacco.

wave my pipe You wave your pipe around in a circle and the bowl of the pipe suddenly glows a bright cherry red! Soon fragrant smoke begins to rise into the air.

kiss pipe You hold your pipe fondly.

tap pipe You lean over and tap the bowl of your pipe on the ground, knocking out ash and bits of tobacco.

Some of the ambient messaging:

You puff contentedly on your bog-wood pipe. A long streamer of smoke floats up into the air and then drifts away.

You puff contentedly on your bog-wood pipe. Small clouds of smoke drift past you as if playing a game of tag.

You puff contentedly on your bog-wood pipe. Several small clouds of smoke rise into the air as if playing tag before drifting away.

You puff contentedly on your bog-wood pipe. A thin trail of pale blue smoke rises into the air and slowly disappears.

You puff contentedly on your bog-wood pipe. A huge cloud of smoke moves past you then rises abruptly into the air and floats away like a large, fragrant balloon.

You puff contentedly on your bog-wood pipe. Delicate rings of smoke rise into the air above you, seeming to link together to form a chain before drifting off into the distance.
